content: I'm thinking of buying tickets to a concert next month, but I'm not sure if I should splurge on floor seats or stick with upper-level seats. What's the general consensus on the best seats for a concert? By the way, I've been to three concerts in the past two months, and I have to say, being close to the stage can make a big difference - like when I saw Billie Eilish at the LA Forum and we ended up right up front!
